# Address Map

## Bus Slaves

| Name | Base Address | Size | End Address |
|------|-------------|------|-------------|
| MEM | `0x0000000000000000` | `0x0000000000010000` | `0x0000000000010000` |
| DEBUG_MODULE | `0x0000000000010000` | `0x0000000000010000` | `0x0000000000020000` |
| PERIPHERALS | `0x0000000000020000` | `0x0000000010000000` | `0x0000000010020000` |
| EXT_SLAVE | `0x0000000010020000` | `0x0000000000010000` | `0x0000000010030000` |

## Peripherals

| Name | Base Address | Size | End Address |
|------|-------------|------|-------------|
| soc_ctrl | `0x0000000000020000` | `0x0000000000001000` | `0x0000000000021000` |
| bootrom | `0x0000000000030000` | `0x0000000000010000` | `0x0000000000040000` |
| fast_intr_ctrl | `0x0000000000040000` | `0x0000000000001000` | `0x0000000000041000` |
| uart | `0x0000000000050000` | `0x0000000000001000` | `0x0000000000051000` |
| ext_peripheral | `0x0000000000060000` | `0x0000000000001000` | `0x0000000000061000` |
